Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality, functionality, and innovation that sets it apart from the rest. Given its unparalleled features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. Considering the significant investment we've made into its development, I propose a price of $15000 for this exclusive product. This offer not only compensates for our costs but also acknowledges the high-quality experience we aim to provide. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
